Edye's Face & Body Butter (2019 formulation)

Brand: Edye's

Category: Body Firming Lotion

Ingredients: ORGANIC EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL, ORGANIC SHEA BUTTER, ORGANIC AVOCADO OIL, ORGANIC COCONUT OIL, BEE'S WAX, ORGANIC CAMELLIA OIL, GRAPE SEED OIL, ORGANIC CARROT SEED OIL, ORGANIC SWEET ORANGE OIL, ORGANIC ROSEMARY OIL, HIMALAYAN SALT.

Ingredient

N SALT.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
